remarks: The unit scalar of the closed kernel dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcd1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcd1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd1.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcd1.j $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
lcd1.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcd1.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcd1.i $e |- I = ( 1r ` S ) $.
lcd1.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcd1 $p |- ( ph -> I = .1. ) $.
